text:
<@UKHNRHVC7> I think you did actually explain that to me before. I frankly spaced it.  I'll give that direction to customers as the reach out.  I'm not sure on the date they edited last.

Thanks for handling it in that portal. I appreciate it.

I hope you don't mind these reports.  I'm SUPER EXCITED for child-themes and what it means for customers so I'm trying to smooth it out as much as possible for them.

<@U022FJKR4CQ> Great question... I've been trying to crack this "custom font nut" for a long time.  Theme files don't except file uploads currently (to my knowledge) so your approach is a pretty good one.
No problem! I'm sorry for the continued customer reports, but I'm so glad you're excited about child themes! We really appreciate all of the feedback and bug reports you've passed on!
Is anyone else experiencing a THEME "INSTALL UPDATE" BUG?  This was working the other day without issue but this morning it's throwing a non-descript error message. :thinking_face:
Hey Kevin, can you DM the portal ID for this and I can pass this internally to see whats happening.
